body_html: FYI, I guess for native build on RPI (which as far as I know is running ARMv7 debain variant) bazel build .... should work out of box. I was able to build and run label_image for tflite on an ARMv8 board running ARM64 debian with some tweaks (see, #16175)
body_text: FYI, I guess for native build on RPI (which as far as I know is running ARMv7 debain variant) bazel build .... should work out of box. I was able to build and run label_image for tflite on an ARMv8 board running ARM64 debian with some tweaks (see, #16175)
body: FYI, I guess for native build on RPI (which as far as I know is running ARMv7 debain variant) `bazel build ....` should work out of box. I was able to build and run [label_image for tflite](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/examples/label_image) on an ARMv8 board running ARM64 debian with some tweaks (see, https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/16175)
